alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:43PM CST until March 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...East Otter Tail County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
